articles.author: Anviksha Patel
articles.title: Fund managers fear a ‘systemic credit event’ as the biggest threat to markets: BofA - MarketWatch
articles.description: Fund managers said the biggest tail risk for March was a systemic credit crunch, according to Bank of America’s latest global fund manager survey.
articles.content: Fund managers fear that a systemic credit crunch is the biggest tail risk this month, Bank of America strategists have said following data from their latest poll.The banks latest global fund manager … [+2221 chars]
